meanings.definition: The art of engraving on wood.
meanings.sent1: She studied xylographies in art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed beautiful xylographies from different artists.
meanings.sent3: The xylographies in the gallery seemed to come alive, telling stories of their own.
meanings.sent4: His xylographies were like windows into a magical world beyond.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the xylographies left a lasting impression on the viewers.

meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a collection of xylographies for sale.
meanings.sent2: She admired the xylographies hanging on the walls of the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The xylographies on the postcards added a vintage touch to her collection.
meanings.sent4: The xylographies on the packaging gave the products a unique and artistic flair.
meanings.sent5: The xylographies in the book were so detailed, they looked almost real.
